4.kam: Ve kĩndu kĩmwe kya vata twaĩle kũelewa ĩũlũ wa ũndũ ũwau wa kolona

13.kam: Ũngama vaasa: mita ilĩ wĩĩthwa weesiĩĩa kumana na kolona.

17.kam: Woona mũndũ aikooa, kwathimũa kana mũndũ mũwau, nyũva kwĩka atĩĩ:

18.kam: Mũnenge kĩkunĩki kya mũnuka kana masiki.  Mũndũ nĩũkooea kana akathimũĩa vo na aisũvĩa andũ ala angĩ.

22.kam: Nĩvatonyeka akethwa ate mũwau, lakini ekĩte kwĩĩsiĩĩa.

23.kam: Andũ ala mena kolona nĩmatonya kwĩthwa mateonekana me awau, ĩndĩ nĩmatonya ũkwatya andũ angĩ ũwau ũsu.

24.kam: Ndũkathi vala ve andũ aingĩ nũndũ ndwĩsĩ nũũ ũla wĩna kolona.

32.kam: Ona nza wa kĩkunĩki kya mũnuka

38.kam: Mata ma mũwau wa kolona nĩmatonya kũkwata syĩndũnĩ ingĩ ta ithi:-

40.kam: Kana ũikwata ũthyũ wa ala me vakuvĩ naku,

42.kam: Wakwata syĩndũ ithi kwa vaati nthũku, na ũikwata ũthyũ waku,

43.kam: Nzĩa nzeo ya kũmina kolona nĩ kũthamba moko na savunĩ, kana mbinyu ĩla ĩtumĩawa sivitalĩ.

44.kam: Kolona nĩtonya kwĩkala masaa maingĩ syĩndũnĩ.

47.kam: Nĩkyo kĩtumi twaĩle kũatĩĩa nzĩa ithi sya kwĩĩsũvĩa:

51.kam: Ndũkakwate ũthyũ waku kana wa mũndũ ũngĩ.  Kethwa nĩ mũvaka ũkwate ũthyũ, thamba moko na savunĩ mathee.

52.kam: Kana ũthambe winĩte wathi wa kũlulukya mwana.na ũithambũka

54.kam: Tala ĩmwe nginya mĩongo ĩlĩ na ũithambũka

57.kam: Kũthamba moko vyũ nĩ Kũthamba ata?

58.kam: Ethwa nĩwakwata, ndũkamake, thamba moko na savunĩ.

59.kam: Ndũkakwate nza wa kĩkunĩki kya mũnuka.

61.kam: Kĩko kĩlikaa nthĩnĩ wa kĩkunĩki wekala nakyo masaa maingĩ

62.kam: Ĩkya kĩkunĩki kya mũnuka kyamesya kĩw’u, kana woona kĩna kĩko.  Ndũkatũmĩe kĩkunĩki kĩmwe mala elĩ.

68.kam: Ndũkaĩsanĩe lĩu, tũikatũmĩanĩe mĩio ya kũĩĩa, ikombe kana taũlo.

69.kam: Ti laisi kũkwata ũthyũ waku na kĩngokoa.

70.kam: Vingũa na ũivinga mĩomo na kĩngokoa kana kĩtuo vandũ va kũtũmĩa moko, ethwa nĩvatonyeka.

74.kam: Thamba moko na savunĩ kĩla ĩvinda

81.kam:
Nzĩa ila tũũtũmĩa kũsiĩĩa kolona nitonya ũtũmĩka kũsiĩĩa maũwau angĩ ta ĩkua, na nĩtwaĩle kũtumia nzia isu kĩla mũthenya.
References: lnformation in comic is based on understanding of COVID19 up till 28 Feb 2020, and mainly from these three references.  https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.htmlhttps://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/  https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Additonal lnformation A PDF version of the comic is available for free download here: https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Sharing Guidelines This comic is free for the general public to share online and through Whatsapp and Telegram, and the downloads are free for printing out as posters for personal and educational use in homes, schools, and workplaces. 
When sharing, please remember these 3 points: 1) No edits to the comics is allowed in any way when sharing. 2) Comics cannot be used for any commercial project 3) lf online, credit the creator on FB by tagging @weimankowart, on IG by tagging @weimankow (IG), or providing a link to instagram com/weimankow
For all other uses, please send a request in to: comicsforgood@gmail.com

87.eng: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow

bookText.eng:
About Coronavirus


















































































About Coronavirus

 SIL Africa Area
Translated by Ruth Munguti
Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
bookText.kam:
Ũwau wa Kolona

Translated by Ruth Munguti

Ve kĩndu kĩmwe kya vata twaĩle kũelewa ĩũlũ wa ũndũ ũwau wa kolona
ũkwatanaw'a.
mũnuka
many'ũũ
metho
malika
Mũndũ ute mũwau
mũndũ mũwau
Kolona ĩkwatanaw'a yĩla mata ma
Ũngama vaasa: mita ilĩ wĩĩthwa weesiĩĩa kumana na kolona.

Mita ilĩ
Akyiũũ
Woona mũndũ aikooa, kwathimũa kana mũndũ mũwau, nyũva kwĩka atĩĩ:
Mũnenge kĩkunĩki kya mũnuka kana masiki.  Mũndũ nĩũkooea kana akathimũĩa vo na aisũvĩa andũ ala angĩ.
kelĩ
Mũnenge  ĩthangũ ya kwathimũĩa.
Kana
Nĩvatonyeka akethwa ate mũwau, lakini ekĩte kwĩĩsiĩĩa.
Andũ ala mena kolona nĩmatonya kwĩthwa mateonekana me awau, ĩndĩ nĩmatonya ũkwatya andũ angĩ ũwau ũsu.

Ndũkathi vala ve andũ aingĩ nũndũ ndwĩsĩ nũũ ũla wĩna kolona.
Isikonĩ
Mũndũ ũte mũwau
Ikwatĩli
Livutinĩ
Ĩthangũnĩ ya kyoonĩ
ikombenĩ
Simũnĩ, kombyũtanĩ
Ona nza wa kĩkunĩki kya mũnuka
Ikwatĩli sya ngolova
Kw'oko kwa kombyũta
Tũlamu
konzinĩ
Moko moo
Mata ma mũwau wa kolona nĩmatonya kũkwata syĩndũnĩ ingĩ ta ithi:-
Inywonthe nĩmũtonya ũkwatwa nĩ kolona.
Kana ũikwata ũthyũ wa ala me vakuvĩ naku,
Ũikiitha metho,
Wakwata syĩndũ ithi kwa vaati nthũku, na ũikwata ũthyũ waku,
Nzĩa nzeo ya kũmina kolona nĩ kũthamba moko na savunĩ, kana mbinyu ĩla ĩtumĩawa sivitalĩ.
Kolona nĩtonya kwĩkala masaa maingĩ syĩndũnĩ.
Savunĩ

Nĩkyo kĩtumi twaĩle kũatĩĩa nzĩa ithi sya kwĩĩsũvĩa:
Thamba moko nginya vaa
savunĩ
kĩngokoa
Ndũkakwate ũthyũ waku kana wa mũndũ ũngĩ.  Kethwa nĩ mũvaka ũkwate ũthyũ, thamba moko na savunĩ mathee.
Kana ũthambe winĩte wathi wa kũlulukya mwana.na ũithambũka
Uungu wa mbwaa
Tala ĩmwe nginya mĩongo ĩlĩ na ũithambũka
Katĩkatĩ wa syaa
Thamba moko nthĩnĩ na nza
Kũthamba moko vyũ nĩ Kũthamba ata?
Ethwa nĩwakwata, ndũkamake, thamba moko na savunĩ.
Ndũkakwate nza wa kĩkunĩki kya mũnuka.
mata
Kĩko kĩlikaa nthĩnĩ wa kĩkunĩki wekala nakyo masaa maingĩ
Ĩkya kĩkunĩki kya mũnuka kyamesya kĩw’u, kana woona kĩna kĩko.  Ndũkatũmĩe kĩkunĩki kĩmwe mala elĩ.
Tũmĩa kĩsiko kya kwĩvũa
Mwana
Tata
Mami
Kĩla mũndũ atũmĩe taũlo yake
Ndũkaĩsanĩe lĩu, tũikatũmĩanĩe mĩio ya kũĩĩa, ikombe kana taũlo.
Ti laisi kũkwata ũthyũ waku na kĩngokoa.
Vingũa na ũivinga mĩomo na kĩngokoa kana kĩtuo vandũ va kũtũmĩa moko, ethwa nĩvatonyeka.
Mũsyĩ
Wauma nza wa mũsyĩ
Mbee wa kũya lĩu
Thamba moko na savunĩ kĩla ĩvinda
Na ĩndĩ mũthya,
Savunĩ
Kĩla mũndũ eesũvĩe!

Kĩla mũndũ eesũvĩe!
Savunĩ
Nzĩa ila tũũtũmĩa kũsiĩĩa kolona nitonya ũtũmĩka kũsiĩĩa maũwau angĩ ta ĩkua, na nĩtwaĩle kũtumia nzia isu kĩla mũthenya.
